creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: twilight scene: snowy mountain, silhouetted hills, and low buildings in middle and background; river in foreground reflecting the scene
inscription: left: 昭和四年作　糸魚川にて {Shōwa yonen saku, Itoigawa nite}
markings: LLC, embossed artist\'s baren seal and embossed artist\'s I seal: 博 {Hiroshi} | red artist\'s seal A: 博 {Hiroshi}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Itoigawa in the Evening
